title: (x) Classic italic serif face - Monotype Garamond {Jan Erdmann}
content:
Does anyone know witch serif font this is?

Many thanks:)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015639im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/NK_STIL_5810.png)

 [‹ (x) "Fränkisch" old style serif - (similar to) Tribunus SG {Scott Dasse}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015639/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33989 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Cars" Pixar movie logo retro script - Magneto {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080212015639/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33995 "Go to next forum topic")
author: henand

comments.content: It’s close to Adobe Garamond but it isn’t exactly.
I know. It looks a bit “stiffer”..
